Store Collector.meta: Editable layer for point data collection.

Notepad.meta:
Click on Add new features section to reveal available shapes.

Once you have clicked on the option you want to use, left click anywhere on the map to draw your shape. Move the cursor and click again. For the Polygon tool only, right click to finish drawing.

infoj.label: Retail places within reach
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_retail_venue b WHERE ST_INTERSECTS(a.geom_4326, b.geom_4326) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Stores within reach
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_retail_points b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Population 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.pop__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Households 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.hholds__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Disposable Income 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.disinc__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Disposable Income 2018 Per Capita
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.disinc__18)/sum(b.pop__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Retail Spend 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.retail__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Food Spend 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.fmcg__18)) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Unemployed 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(sum(eac_unemployed__11)/sum(eac_unemployed__11+eac_employed__11)*100) FROM smiles.notepad a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Under 4 years
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(ageunder4)*sum(pop__18)/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 4-11 years
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age4to11)*sum(pop__18)/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 12-16 years
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age12to16)*sum(pop__18)/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 17-65 years
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age17to21+age22to35+age36to45+age46to55+age56to65)*sum(pop__18)/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 65+ years
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age65to75+age75plus)*sum(pop__18)/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Under 4 years percentage
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(ageunder4)*100/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 4-11 year percentage
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age4to11)*100/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 12-16 years percentage
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age12to16)*100/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 17-65 years percentage
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age17to21+age22to35+age36to45+age46to55+age56to65)*100/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: 65+ years percentage
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(age65to75+age75plus)*100/sum(pop__11) FROM geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 h, smiles.notepad a where ST_DWITHIN(a.geom_4326, h.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.auto_id = $1

infoj.label: Population 2018
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.pop__18)) FROM smiles.sites a, geodata.pol_glx_geodata_hex_500 b WHERE ST_DWITHIN(a.isoline_5min, b.geom_p_4326, 0) AND a.id = $1

infoj.label: Disposable Income 2018 Per Capita

wojewodztwa_population.template: SELECT pop2018dec, pop2017dec, pop2016dec, pop2015dec, pop2014dec, pop2013dec, pop2012dec FROM geodata.pol_glx_counties WHERE id=${id}

powiaty_population.template: SELECT pop2018dec, pop2017dec, pop2016dec, pop2015dec, pop2014dec, pop2013dec, pop2012dec FROM geodata.pol_glx_powiaty WHERE id=${id}
